name: Ninja Mosquito Coils 10 Hours
description: NINJA, a truly Sri Lankan product, is manufactured by the first ‘household’ insecticide company in Sri Lanka to receive the SLS certification. NINJA’s active ingredients are imported from buyer Germany as well as Sumitomo Chemicals, Japan. All other raw materials are sourced in Sri Lanka. This state of the art, eco-friendly mosquito coil & vaporizer manufacturing facility, offers over 200 jobs in the Millewa community in the Kalutara District, following its relocation under the auspices of the Gamata Karmantha Scheme. 10 hour lasting mosquito coil.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
